name: read_file
description: Reads and returns the content of a specified file. If the file is large, the content will be truncated. The tool's response will clearly indicate if truncation has occurred and will provide details on how to read more of the file using the 'offset' and 'limit' parameters. Handles text files.

file_path.description: The path to the file to read.

limit.description: Optional: For text files, maximum number of lines to read. Use with 'offset' to paginate through large files. If omitted, reads the entire file (if feasible, up to a default limit).

offset.description: Optional: For text files, the 0-based line number to start reading from. Requires 'limit' to be set. Use for paginating through large files.
